name: Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile.

name: Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A warm, positive smile with smiling eyes.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: A face laughing so hard that it is crying tears of joy.

name: Thinking Face
description: A face with a hand on its chin, deep in thought.

name: Smiling Face with Sunglasses
description: A cool smiley face wearing dark sunglasses.

name: Red Heart
description: A classic red heart, used to express love and affection.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A hand with the thumb extended upward, indicating approval.

name: Clapping Hands
description: Two hands clapping to show appreciation or congratulations.

name: Fire
description: A flame, often used to indicate something is hot or trending.

name: Party Popper
description: A party popper with confetti, used to celebrate events.

name: Rocket
description: A rocket blasting off, often used to convey fast growth or success.

name: Laptop
description: A laptop computer, used to represent technology or work.

name: Graduation Cap
description: A graduation cap, representing education and academic success.

name: Globe Showing Americas
description: A globe showing the American continents, symbolizing the Earth.

name: Sun
description: A bright sun, associated with clear skies and warm weather.

name: Cloud
description: A simple cloud, often used to depict weather or online storage.

name: Soccer Ball
description: A classic black-and-white soccer ball, representing sports.

name: Basketball
description: An orange basketball, used in the sport of the same name.

name: Pizza
description: A slice of pepperoni pizza with cheese and crust.

name: Hamburger
description: A hamburger with bun, patty, and toppings.

name: Taco
description: A taco with a filled shell, often used to represent Mexican food.

name: Dog Face
description: A friendly dog face, usually a cartoon-style pet.

name: Cat Face
description: A cute cat face, representing pets or felines.

name: Koala
description: A koala face, representing the Australian marsupial.

name: Robot
description: A robot face, often used in the context of AI and technology.
